Package com.cs546.backend.core.city

Class CityBuildTool

java.lang.Object
com.cs546.backend.core.city.CityBuildTool
public class CityBuildTool
extends java.lang.Object
Responsible for allowing ways to build new components and connections in the city.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CityBuildTool​(City city)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean buildCoalPowerPlant​(Coordinates coordinates, ComponentSize componentSize)
    Builds a coal type of PowerComponent at not-in-use coordinates of a particular size set by the ComponentSize enum and only if the city has enough budget during the current tick to feasibly do so.
    boolean buildHouse​(Coordinates coordinates, ComponentSize componentSize)
    Builds a house on not-in-use coordinates of a particular size set by the ComponentSize enum and whether the city has enough in its budget at that tick to do so
    boolean buildHydroPowerPlant​(Coordinates coordinates, ComponentSize componentSize)
    Builds a hydro type of PowerComponent at not-in-use coordinates of a particular size set by the ComponentSize enum and only if the city has enough budget during the current tick to feasibly do so.
    boolean buildIndustrialComponent​(Coordinates coordinates, ComponentSize componentSize)
    Builds a industrial component on not-in-use coordinates of a particular size set by the ComponentSize enum and whether the city has enough in its budget at that tick to do so
    boolean buildPowerLines​(Node powerSource, Node node)
    Creates a power connection between a power source and another node.
    boolean buildRetailComponent​(Coordinates coordinates, ComponentSize componentSize)
    Builds a retail component on not-in-use coordinates of a particular size set by the ComponentSize enum and whether the city has enough in its budget at that tick to do so
    boolean buildRoad​(Coordinates coordinates)
    Builds a road at not-in-use coordinates and only if the city's budget can feasibly do so
    boolean buildWindPowerPlant​(Coordinates coordinates, ComponentSize componentSize)
    Builds a wind type of PowerComponent at not-in-use coordinates of a particular size set by the ComponentSize enum and only if the city has enough budget during the current tick to feasibly do so.
    Node bulldoze​(Coordinates coordinates)
    Destroys a component at coordinates within the city if the city budget allows

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
